info.name: Calendar API Complete
info.description:
Complete Postman collection for the Calendar API with all endpoints and dummy test data.

## Base URL
`{{baseUrl}}` = http://localhost:3000

## API Version
All endpoints are prefixed with `/api/v1`

## Features
- Class management (CRUD)
- Class instances for recurring classes
- Calendar view
- Status updates
- Search and filtering
